item.title: Some thoughts on CPU threads
item.description: Multithreaded I’m currently reading about threads. Multithreading seems to allow multiple “controllers” for a single process. For instance, maybe while using the Spotify app, I am both able to listen to music being streamed through the app and search for a different song to listen to, simultaneously. One thread is handling the streaming, while one thread is handling my input, while maybe even another thread is handling the actual logic for the search query.
